backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Video and ScheduledPost types with storage maps, providing functions to upload videos, schedule posts, and query them by workspace (travel or aiLearning).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: replacing 'Post Now' with 'Copy Captions', updating scheduled posts workflow to clarify manual posting, and removing simulated social platform publishing utilities.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend components, hooks, and utilities describing their roles in video upload, caption generation, scheduling, authentication, and workspace management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with custom properties for UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the NicheHub application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the app with ThemeProvider and WorkspaceProvider, rendering Layout with tabbed navigation between Media Library and Schedule Calendar views.
frontend/src/components/Calendar.tsx: Monthly calendar component displaying scheduled posts with drag-and-drop support for scheduling videos, navigation controls, and integration with TimePickerModal for dropped videos.
frontend/src/components/DateTimePickerMo: Modal dialog with calendar and time input for selecting future dates/times to schedule posts, with validation preventing past date selection.
frontend/src/components/HelpModal.tsx: A dialog modal that explains the four-step workflow of NicheHub: uploading videos, generating AI captions, scheduling posts, and manually copying/posting to social platforms.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component with header (logo, help button, login/logout), footer (social icons, attribution), and a container for child content.
frontend/src/components/MediaLibrary.tsx: Displays a grid of uploaded videos with upload functionality and opens a repurpose modal when a video is selected for caption generation.
frontend/src/components/RepurposeModal.t: Modal for generating and editing platform-specific captions (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok) with options to copy all captions or schedule posts for selected platforms.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleButton.t: Button component that opens a date/time picker modal and handles scheduling posts for multiple platforms with the provided captions.
frontend/src/components/ScheduledPostIte: Displays a scheduled post with video thumbnail, time, platform icons, and a copy button to copy all platform captions to clipboard.
Modal for selecting time and platforms when scheduling a post from the calendar, with caption generation and validation before confirming the schedule.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: Card component displaying a video thumbnail/preview with caption text and a repurpose button, supporting drag-and-drop for calendar scheduling.
frontend/src/components/VideoUpload.tsx: React component that handles video file uploads with authentication checks, progress tracking, and workspace context integration. Converts selected video files to Uint8Array and uploads them via the useUploadVideo hook.
React component providing a toggle UI to switch between Travel and AI Learning workspaces using icons and buttons. Reads and updates workspace state from WorkspaceContext.
frontend/src/contexts/WorkspaceContext.t: React context provider that manages workspace state (Travel or AI Learning) with localStorage persistence. Provides workspace getter/setter to child components via useWorkspace hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity state. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation. Provides login, logout, and status tracking functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching videos and scheduled posts by workspace, uploading videos with progress tracking, and scheduling posts. Handles cache invalidation and toast notifications for mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for dark theme colors using OKLCH color space. Includes base styles for touch-friendly UI, smooth scrolling, and mobile optimizations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component. Configures the provider hierarchy for global state management.
frontend/src/utils/captionGenerator.ts: Utility function that generates platform-specific captions (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok) from a base caption with appropriate formatting, hashtags, and engagement prompts. Simulates AI generation with a delay.
frontend/src/utils/socialPlatformPublish: Empty utility file, likely intended for future implementation of social media platform publishing functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file defining NicheHub, a mobile content management and social media scheduling app with multi-workspace support (Travel/AI Learning), AI caption generation, and calendar-based scheduling. Includes architectural notes, existing features (workspace toggle, video upload, AI repurposing, calendar scheduling, Internet Identity auth), and planned features (analytics, notifications, batch operations).
